OpcodeInfo Struct Reference

#include <enc_prvt.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

exactly the same as EncoderBase.OpcodeDesc, but also holds info about platform on which the opcode is applicable.


Public Types

enum  platform {
  all, em64t, ia32, decoder,
  decoder32, decoder64
